subject: Re: [junit] How can I write test case before write concrete cless
msgSnippet: In addition to Googling (while trying not to go overboard in plugging a mailing list member s textbook), I d suggest investigating J.B Rainsberger s JUnit
messageBody:
In addition to Googling (while trying not to go overboard in plugging a
mailing list member's textbook), I'd suggest investigating J.B
Rainsberger's "JUnit Recipes" -
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/1932394230/ref=ase_masterprogram-20.
J.B. has an excellent section on testing by interfaces, and I use it all
the time. :)

Steve.

--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

Ilja Preuss wrote:
> Google for "abstract testcase".
